ygData.messageBody:
I don't even really notice this because 90% of the time, I am looking
at my messages scrolling by. This helps me to twist songs (along w/
counting beats in my head) and so I will always see the messages that
say when your spells are going to wear off. I know that Invis(undead
and regular), Illusions, Endure Breath, Levitate, etc. all give you a
couple of *warning* messages. i.e. "You feel you are about to look
like yourself."

~Beatdrop Battledrum


--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@h...> wrote:
> Ok I missunderstood the first question:
>
> Bard Icons do not flash for the bard because their duration is
shorter than
> the flash warning period (ie: They'd be flashing all the time.
Annoying to
> say the least)
>
> However, there's a long standing bug/feature/whatever that IF you
are
> playing a song (heh are we ever NOT playing one?) then NONE of your
icons
> will flash. Not sure if that's because the client can't tell which
are bard
> icons and which are not if one of ours is active.
>
> Either way. If you have a song effect ACTIVE during the time that
a spell
> is wearing off it's icon won't flash. If you are not playing a
song (ie:
> have no song effects active) your icons will flash before fading.
>
> Hope this helps!
>
> Lyrnia
